title: ‘KPop Demon Hunters’ Singers to Perform ‘Golden’ at BAFTA Film Awards
summary: The BAFTAs will embrace the biggest animation phenomenon of the year after all. EJAE, Audrey Nuna and Rei Ami — better known as the singing voices for Rumi, Mira and Zoey from the band HUNTR/X in Netflix’s megahit “Kpop Demon Hunters” — are set to perform the film’s record-breaking anthem “Golden” …
